data.actual_result: No audio is received even though the users show the green circle around their avatar indicating that they're speaking
data.expected_result: Audio from the user(s) is received to your end
data.short_description: No audio received while using Standard or Legacy Audio Subsystems
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter User Settings > Voice & Video - Scroll down to Audio Subsystem and make sure you're using Standard or Legacy - Proceed to join a Voice Channel and have audio be outputted from a user (music bots are easy to use to test) for you to receive
